title: Has the value of the TED Cruz network increased from $500 to $4.6 million since joining the United States Senate?
subtitle: My party Mimi called the senator almost ten times the increase in net value over six years on the salary of $174,000 a year'very impressive.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The net value of Ted Cruz rose from $500,000 when he joined the Senate in 2013 to $4.6 million, with a salary of $174,000 per year.
